34.eng-name: The Book of Hunting, Slaughter, and what may be Eaten
34.ara-name: كتاب الصيد والذبائح وما يؤكل من الحيوان

hadiths.text: Shaddid b. Aus said:Two are the things which I remember Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) having said: Verily Allah has enjoined goodness to everything; so when you kill, kill in a good way and when you slaughter, slaughter in a good way. So every one of you should sharpen his knife, and let the slaughtered animal die comfortably

chapter.ara-name: باب الأَمْرِ بِإِحْسَانِ الذَّبْحِ وَالْقَتْلِ وَتَحْدِيدِ الشَّفْرَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The command to be proficient in slaughtering and killing, and to sharpen the blade
